The '''Vulcan Crew''' was a group of [[flow arts]] practitioners based at [[Vulcan Lofts]] in Oakland, California. Members of the Vulcan Crew were instrumental in developing the [[Vulcan Tech Gospel]] (VTG) notation system for [[poi]] technique.

== Notable members ==

* [[Noel Yee]] - VTG creator, [[Flow Arts Institute]] co-founder
* [[David Cantor]] - VTG Vol. 2 co-author
* [[Brian Thompson]] - Club hybrid researcher

== Legacy ==

The collaborative environment at Vulcan Lofts allowed the crew to develop and refine the VTG system through daily practice and discussion. Their work laid the groundwork for systematic technical analysis of poi movement that influenced later frameworks including [[Continuous Assembly Patterns]] and [[The Kinetic Alphabet]].
